item.title: Server Update #4
item.description:
- Update to 1.21.7
- Fix exploits
- Add some plugins
- Fix error with permissions
- Increase size of homes
- Fix Discord bot
- Autorestart
- New versions of plugins
- Add RSS

item.title: Server Update #3
item.description:
- Disabled Antipopup (enabling soon!)
- Removed death messages
- Disabled image frames (enabling soon!)
- Switched to 1.21.6
- Added support for old versions
- Server has more stability
- Fixed tab plugin showing old server website

item.title: Server Update #2
item.description:
- Added Bedrock support
- New operating system
- New domain: mc.oranges.lt
- Removed city
- Native 1.21.5
- Fixed commands
- Better SSL for website
- Fixed some dangerous exploits

item.title: Server Update #1
item.description:
- /kill added
- Server optimized
- /stuck added
- Removed annoying "chat isn't secure" popup
- Better commands
- Permissions and roles fixed
- Command permissions fixed
- New home plugin
- New highways in Nether
- New currency: EUR
- 1 MIL border increasing soon!
- /tp deleted
- Custom death
- Random spawn location
